overview: The All Girl Hotel is packed full of pussy hungry lesbians tonight, and the administration couldn't be more pleased with their superb fleet of maids and masseuses waiting to take the call! Lola the lawyer has been working long and hard on a case far away from home, and it's taking its toll. When her master masseuse arrives, the things running through her innocent head are neither the slick and sensual rubdown nor the sensual asslicking she deserves. Our night in the Hotel only gets off on a gentle roll from there, up until the Starr Sisters are grounded at the airport and their day of tiresome flights results in an assumedly restless sl--p far from the comfort of their own beds. Jada Stevens and Kristina Rose know exactly what it takes to turn this traveling sisterhood of stewardesses into a thigh lapping four-way lesbian lickfest.
title: In-room Rubdown
